title: Emerging Assets Move Past Venezuela Risk to Scale Fresh Highs
description: Emerging-market stocks hit a fresh record high and currencies edged higher as investor focus shifted away from geopolitical risks posed by the US intervention in Venezuela and bullish sentiment around the global asset class strengthened.
content: Emerging-market stocks hit a fresh record high and currencies edged higher as investor focus shifted away from geopolitical risks posed by the US intervention in Venezuela and bullish sentiment around the global asset class strengthened.
